ing: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "No baking, easy to prepare, delicious, beautiful, kids love it, great for any holiday or event.  Eye appeal: when adding gelatin to applesauce, take a pinch of gelatin and set aside.  After frosting cake, sprinkle pinch of gelatin over the top.   As it sits in the fridge, gelatin will "flower" and looks beautiful."
ins:
Reserve one pinch of gelatin.  Combine most of gelatin with applesauce.  On a serving platter, place 4 graham cracker sheets, long edges together, in a single layer.  Spread 1/2 cup of applesauce mixture over crackers.  Repeat layers until all crackers and applesauce are used.  Frost with whipped topping.
Sprinkle reserved gelatin over top of cake.  Chill in refrigerator 6 hours or overnight before serving.  Cut crosswise like a loaf of bread to serve.
